languages.text: "Это был блестящий удар, Лорд-капитан, но как же ремонт, расходы?.. Возможно, вам будет угодно остановиться на достигнутом?"
"An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"
languages.original_text: "Это был блестящий удар, Лорд-капитан, но как же ремонт, расходы?.. Возможно, вам будет угодно остановиться на достигнутом?"

traits.locale_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"
"An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"
"An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

"An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"
"An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

languages.text: «Un disparo excelente, Lord Capitán, pero ¿qué hay de las reparaciones? ¿De los costes? ¿No considera que ha conseguido ya suficiente?».
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: «Un disparo excelente, Lord Capitán, pero ¿qué hay de las reparaciones? ¿De los costes? ¿No considera que ha conseguido ya suficiente?».

languages.text: “打得漂亮，舰长大人。不过，舰船的修理费用该怎么办呢？您的指挥带来了出色的成果，或许您已经心满意足了，是吗？”
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: “打得漂亮，舰长大人。不过，舰船的修理费用该怎么办呢？您的指挥带来了出色的成果，或许您已经心满意足了，是吗？”

languages.text: « Joli tir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais avez-vous songé au coût des réparations ? Peut-être pourriez-vous en rester là et vous contenter des dégâts que vous avez déjà occasionnés ? »
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: « Joli tir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais avez-vous songé au coût des réparations ? Peut-être pourriez-vous en rester là et vous contenter des dégâts que vous avez déjà occasionnés ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、すばらしい射撃ですが、修理とか費用とかはどうするんですか？もしかして、やり遂げたことに満足しているんじゃないでしょうね？」
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、すばらしい射撃ですが、修理とか費用とかはどうするんですか？もしかして、やり遂げたことに満足しているんじゃないでしょうね？」

languages.text: "Atış mükemmel olmasına mükemmel de Lord Kaptan... Onarım masrafları ne olacak? Belki de elde ettiğiniz başarı sizi memnun etmeye yetiyordur..."
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: "Atış mükemmel olmasına mükemmel de Lord Kaptan... Onarım masrafları ne olacak? Belki de elde ettiğiniz başarı sizi memnun etmeye yetiyordur..."

languages.text: "Ausgezeichneter Schuss, Lord Captain, aber was ist mit den Reparaturen? Den Kosten? Vielleicht könnt Ihr Euch mit dem bisher Erreichten ja zufrieden geben?"
languages.original_text: "An excellent shot, Lord Captain, but what about the repairs, the costs? Perhaps you would be willing to take satisfaction in what you have already achieved?"

traits.locale_text: "Ausgezeichneter Schuss, Lord Captain, aber was ist mit den Reparaturen? Den Kosten? Vielleicht könnt Ihr Euch mit dem bisher Erreichten ja zufrieden geben?"
